jobs.duties_and_responsibilities:
Leadership and Personnel Management

Direct and coordinate the activities of the entire construction crew, including in-house staff and subcontractors, ensuring tasks are completed efficiently and according to plan.
Plan daily and weekly work schedules, assign specific duties to workers based on their skills and project needs, and monitor attendance and performance.
Provide on-the-job training and guidance to less experienced workers on construction methods, safety procedures, and company policies, fostering professional development and a culture of improvement.
Proactively identify and resolve conflicts or issues that may arise among the team, maintaining high morale and a positive, collaborative work environment.
Evaluate the caliber of the work being done by individual craft professionals and the overall team, providing continuous feedback for improvement.

Project Execution and Quality Control

Read, interpret, and explain blueprints, plans, and technical specifications to the crew, ensuring all work is executed accurately to design and building codes.
Conduct regular site inspections to ensure all work meets stringent quality standards and project specifications, addressing any deviations promptly to prevent costly rework.
Apply in-depth, hands-on knowledge of construction procedures, especially in concrete work, masonry, and plumbing, to guide the team and troubleshoot technical problems in real-time.
Respond quickly and effectively to unforeseen challenges, equipment breakdowns, or scheduling changes, making sound decisions to keep the project on track.

Safety and Compliance

Champion a safety-first culture by enforcing strict adherence to all health, safety, and environmental (HSE) regulations and company safety policies.
Lead daily safety "toolbox talks" and conduct regular site and equipment inspections to identify potential hazards and ensure all personnel are using appropriate Personal Protective Equipment (PPE).
Document and report any incidents, accidents, or near-misses immediately and assist in implementing corrective actions to prevent recurrence.
Ensure all operations comply with local and national regulatory requirements, including the National Construction Authority (NCA) guidelines (where applicable).

Resource and Cost Management

Coordinate the ordering, delivery, storage, and optimal use of materials, tools, and heavy equipment, minimizing waste and preventing project delays.
Monitor expenditures, tracking labor hours and material costs to help ensure the project remains within the allocated budget.
Maintain accurate daily site records, including progress reports, daily logs, material usage sheets, and safety documentation, and communicate project status to project managers and stakeholders.
jobs.key_requirements_skills_qualification:
Proven experience in gardening, landscaping, or grounds maintenance
Degree or Diploma in Building & Construction, Civil Engineering, Construction Management, or a related field.
A minimum of 7-10 years of proven experience in construction supervision, specifically managing residential or commercial projects
In-depth knowledge of construction procedures, methods, and equipment. Hands-on expertise in concrete work, masonry, plumbing, and general commercial project installations
Strong leadership, integrity, and exceptional team supervision skills, with the ability to manage and motivate a large workforce

jobs.duties_and_responsibilities:
Business Development & Sales Growth

Proactively identify and prospect new clients within the assigned territory focusing on garages, workshops, industrial businesses, transport companies (PSV Saccos, logistics firms), and SMEs.
Develop and execute strategic sales plans to achieve and exceed monthly and quarterly sales targets and expand market share.
Systematically map the territory to identify business clusters, prioritize high-potential leads, and manage the entire sales pipeline from initial contact to closing.

Client Relationship Management & Account Servicing

Build and maintain strong, long-lasting relationships with new and existing customers to ensure high retention rates and loyalty.
Conduct thorough needs assessments to understand clients' machinery, equipment, operational demands, and current lubrication challenges, recommending appropriate products and solutions.
Serve as the primary point of contact for an assigned portfolio of clients, ensuring prompt resolution of any issues or complaints by coordinating with the technical support or operations teams.

Product Expertise & Technical Consultation

Possess in-depth knowledge of various lubricant products (automotive engine oils, industrial oils, greases, coolants, specialty fluids), their technical specifications, and correct applications.
Act as a trusted advisor, providing basic technical guidance and conducting product demonstrations or small training sessions for client staff (e.g., mechanics, machine operators) on proper handling and application.

Market Intelligence & Reporting

Monitor and report on competitor activities, market trends, and new products to help determine pricing strategies and identify opportunities for product or service improvements.
Prepare and present regular reports on sales forecasts, territory performance, and expenses to management.

Sales Administration & Compliance

Prepare accurate and timely sales quotations, proposals, contracts, and manage order submissions efficiently.
Maintain accurate and detailed records of all sales activities, client interactions, and pipelines using the company’s CRM system daily.
Ensure all sales operations comply with company policies, safety standards, and relevant regulatory requirements.
jobs.key_requirements_skills_qualification:
A Diploma in Sales & Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field. A Bachelor's degree is an added advantage
Minimum of two (2) years of proven working experience in the sales of lubricants, petroleum products, or gas distribution is essential
Demonstrated success in field sales and client relationship management, with a history of meeting or exceeding sales goals
Strong understanding of industrial and automotive lubricants and their applications
Excellent negotiation, persuasive communication (verbal and written), and presentation skills.
Competence in Microsoft Office Suite (Excel, Word, PowerPoint) and familiarity with CRM software is an asset

jobs.duties_and_responsibilities:
Leadership and Personnel Management

Direct and coordinate the activities of the entire construction crew, including in-house staff and subcontractors, ensuring tasks are completed efficiently and according to plan.
Plan daily and weekly work schedules, assign specific duties to workers based on their skills and project needs, and monitor attendance and performance.
Provide on-the-job training and guidance to less experienced workers on construction methods, safety procedures, and company policies, fostering professional development and a culture of improvement.
Proactively identify and resolve conflicts or issues that may arise among the team, maintaining high morale and a positive, collaborative work environment.
Evaluate the caliber of the work being done by individual craft professionals and the overall team, providing continuous feedback for improvement.

Project Execution and Quality Control

Read, interpret, and explain blueprints, plans, and technical specifications to the crew, ensuring all work is executed accurately to design and building codes.
Conduct regular site inspections to ensure all work meets stringent quality standards and project specifications, addressing any deviations promptly to prevent costly rework.
Apply in-depth, hands-on knowledge of construction procedures, especially in concrete work, masonry, and plumbing, to guide the team and troubleshoot technical problems in real-time.
Respond quickly and effectively to unforeseen challenges, equipment breakdowns, or scheduling changes, making sound decisions to keep the project on track.

Safety and Compliance

Champion a safety-first culture by enforcing strict adherence to all health, safety, and environmental (HSE) regulations and company safety policies.
Lead daily safety "toolbox talks" and conduct regular site and equipment inspections to identify potential hazards and ensure all personnel are using appropriate Personal Protective Equipment (PPE).
Document and report any incidents, accidents, or near-misses immediately and assist in implementing corrective actions to prevent recurrence.
Ensure all operations comply with local and national regulatory requirements, including the National Construction Authority (NCA) guidelines (where applicable).

Resource and Cost Management

Coordinate the ordering, delivery, storage, and optimal use of materials, tools, and heavy equipment, minimizing waste and preventing project delays.
Monitor expenditures, tracking labor hours and material costs to help ensure the project remains within the allocated budget.
Maintain accurate daily site records, including progress reports, daily logs, material usage sheets, and safety documentation, and communicate project status to project managers and stakeholders.

jobs.duties_and_responsibilities:
Strategic Quality Development

Design and implement hospital-wide quality improvement strategies aligned with clinical excellence and operational efficiency goals.
Establish long-term quality objectives and create measurable action plans to achieve them.
Stay abreast of national and international healthcare quality trends to ensure the hospital remains at the forefront of best practices.

Compliance, Accreditation & Risk Management

Ensure hospital operations meet or exceed standards set by regulatory and oversight bodies, including Safecare and ISO9001 accreditation requirements.
Coordinate internal and external audits and inspections; develop and oversee corrective and preventive action plans.
Promote a culture of compliance and risk mitigation across all departments.

Data-Driven Quality Improvement

Collect, analyze, and interpret hospital performance data to monitor Key Performance Indicators (KPIs).
Identify quality gaps and lead initiatives to close them using evidence-based methodologies (e.g., Root Cause Analysis, PDSA cycles).
Provide regular reports and insights to senior management and department heads to support informed decision-making.

Interdepartmental Collaboration & Leadership

Lead cross-functional quality improvement teams comprising clinical, administrative, and support staff.
Facilitate regular quality review meetings and communicate quality goals, progress, and expectations clearly.
Act as a liaison between the quality department and other hospital units to ensure alignment of quality priorities.

Patient Experience Enhancement

Work closely with the patient care teams to identify areas for improving the patient journey, clinical outcomes, and service delivery.
Implement and monitor initiatives aimed at enhancing patient satisfaction scores and reducing patient complaints.
Utilize patient feedback and survey data to make evidence-based improvements.

 Documentation and Information Management

Oversee the accuracy, completeness, and integrity of clinical and operational documentation, including patient consent forms, treatment records, and policy manuals.
Ensure that document control practices meet legal, ethical, and accreditation standards.
Support the development of standard operating procedures (SOPs) and maintain up-to-date documentation repositories.
jobs.key_requirements_skills_qualification:
Degree in a medical or health-related field (e.g., Nursing, Clinical Medicine, Public Health, Health Systems Management)
Minimum of 2 years’ experience in a similar Quality Lead or quality management role within a Level 4 or higher healthcare facility
Strong familiarity with Safecare and ISO9001 quality standards, with proven experience leading or supporting successful accreditation processes
Demonstrated track record of implementing hospital-wide quality improvement initiatives

jobs.duties_and_responsibilities:
Leadership and Personnel Management

Direct and coordinate the activities of the entire construction crew, including in-house staff and subcontractors, ensuring tasks are completed efficiently and according to plan.
Plan daily and weekly work schedules, assign specific duties to workers based on their skills and project needs, and monitor attendance and performance.
Provide on-the-job training and guidance to less experienced workers on construction methods, safety procedures, and company policies, fostering professional development and a culture of improvement.
Proactively identify and resolve conflicts or issues that may arise among the team, maintaining high morale and a positive, collaborative work environment.
Evaluate the caliber of the work being done by individual craft professionals and the overall team, providing continuous feedback for improvement.

Project Execution and Quality Control

Read, interpret, and explain blueprints, plans, and technical specifications to the crew, ensuring all work is executed accurately to design and building codes.
Conduct regular site inspections to ensure all work meets stringent quality standards and project specifications, addressing any deviations promptly to prevent costly rework.
Apply in-depth, hands-on knowledge of construction procedures, especially in concrete work, masonry, and plumbing, to guide the team and troubleshoot technical problems in real-time.
Respond quickly and effectively to unforeseen challenges, equipment breakdowns, or scheduling changes, making sound decisions to keep the project on track.

Safety and Compliance

Champion a safety-first culture by enforcing strict adherence to all health, safety, and environmental (HSE) regulations and company safety policies.
Lead daily safety "toolbox talks" and conduct regular site and equipment inspections to identify potential hazards and ensure all personnel are using appropriate Personal Protective Equipment (PPE).
Document and report any incidents, accidents, or near-misses immediately and assist in implementing corrective actions to prevent recurrence.
Ensure all operations comply with local and national regulatory requirements, including the National Construction Authority (NCA) guidelines (where applicable).

Resource and Cost Management

Coordinate the ordering, delivery, storage, and optimal use of materials, tools, and heavy equipment, minimizing waste and preventing project delays.
Monitor expenditures, tracking labor hours and material costs to help ensure the project remains within the allocated budget.
Maintain accurate daily site records, including progress reports, daily logs, material usage sheets, and safety documentation, and communicate project status to project managers and stakeholders.
jobs.key_requirements_skills_qualification:
Proven experience in gardening, landscaping, or grounds maintenance
Degree or Diploma in Building & Construction, Civil Engineering, Construction Management, or a related field.
A minimum of 7-10 years of proven experience in construction supervision, specifically managing residential or commercial projects
In-depth knowledge of construction procedures, methods, and equipment. Hands-on expertise in concrete work, masonry, plumbing, and general commercial project installations
Strong leadership, integrity, and exceptional team supervision skills, with the ability to manage and motivate a large workforce

Design and implement hospital-wide quality improvement strategies aligned with clinical excellence and operational efficiency goals.
Establish long-term quality objectives and create measurable action plans to achieve them.
Stay abreast of national and international healthcare quality trends to ensure the hospital remains at the forefront of best practices.

Compliance, Accreditation & Risk Management

Ensure hospital operations meet or exceed standards set by regulatory and oversight bodies, including Safecare and ISO9001 accreditation requirements.
Coordinate internal and external audits and inspections; develop and oversee corrective and preventive action plans.

Collect, analyze, and interpret hospital performance data to monitor Key Performance Indicators (KPIs).
Identify quality gaps and lead initiatives to close them using evidence-based methodologies (e.g., Root Cause Analysis, PDSA cycles).
Provide regular reports and insights to senior management and department heads to support informed decision-making.

Interdepartmental Collaboration & Leadership

Facilitate regular quality review meetings and communicate quality goals, progress, and expectations clearly.
Act as a liaison between the quality department and other hospital units to ensure alignment of quality priorities.

Patient Experience Enhancement

Work closely with the patient care teams to identify areas for improving the patient journey, clinical outcomes, and service delivery.
Implement and monitor initiatives aimed at enhancing patient satisfaction scores and reducing patient complaints.
Utilize patient feedback and survey data to make evidence-based improvements.

 Documentation and Information Management

Oversee the accuracy, completeness, and integrity of clinical and operational documentation, including patient consent forms, treatment records, and policy manuals.
Ensure that document control practices meet legal, ethical, and accreditation standards.
Support the development of standard operating procedures (SOPs) and maintain up-to-date documentation repositories.

jobs.duties_and_responsibilities:
Backend Architecture & System Design

Architect scalable, secure, and highly available backend systems capable of supporting complex business workflows and high user volumes.
Design data models, storage strategies, and integration patterns that ensure optimal performance and maintainability.
Evaluate and recommend backend frameworks, technologies, and tools aligned with project requirements and long-term scalability.

API & Service Development

Develop, maintain, and enhance RESTful and/or GraphQL APIs that interface with web and mobile applications.
Ensure APIs are robust, well-documented, versioned appropriately, and optimized for performance.
Implement microservices where applicable, ensuring modularity, reliability, and ease of deployment.

Database Management & Optimization

Work with both relational (MySQL, PostgreSQL) and NoSQL (MongoDB, Redis) databases to design efficient data storage solutions.
Optimize queries, monitor database health, and troubleshoot performance issues.
Implement backup, replication, and database security best practices.

Integration & Third-Party Services

Integrate systems with external APIs, payment gateways, authentication providers, and other third-party services.
Manage API authentication flows (OAuth, JWT, etc.) to ensure secure and seamless communication.

Code Quality, Testing & Documentation

Write clean, maintainable, well-structured code following industry best practices.
Conduct unit, integration, and automated tests to ensure code stability and reliability.
Participate in peer code reviews and enforce quality standards across the development team.
Maintain accurate technical documentation including architecture diagrams, API references, and deployment guides.

Performance Monitoring & Troubleshooting

Monitor system performance using logging, profiling, and analytics tools.
Diagnose bottlenecks, debug system failures, and implement fixes to ensure smooth operation.
Continuously refine system performance through caching, load balancing, and resource optimization.

Collaboration & Cross-Functional Support

Collaborate closely with frontend, mobile, QA, DevOps, and product teams to deliver end-to-end features.
Support the deployment process, troubleshoot issues across environments, and stabilize releases.
Provide technical insights during planning, grooming, and architecture discussions.

Security & Compliance

Implement and maintain strong security practices such as encryption, secure authentication, rate limiting, and data protection.
Identify and resolve vulnerabilities, ensuring compliance with relevant regulations and standards.
Conduct regular security audits and participate in threat modeling sessions.

Continuous Improvement & Innovation

Stay updated on emerging backend technologies, tools, and best practices.
Proactively suggest improvements to architecture, processes, and workflows.
Mentor junior developers and contribute to building a strong engineering culture.
jobs.key_requirements_skills_qualification:
Degree in computer science, information technology, or a related field
A minimum of 7 years’ experience in backend development for web and mobile applications
Demonstrated proficiency with open-source web and mobile development technologies (e.g., node.js, python, php, ruby, go, etc.)
Strong experience designing and building scalable backend architectures
Understanding of relational and nosql databases (e.g., mysql, postgresql, mongodb)
Experience with api development (rest, graphql), microservices, and service-oriented architecture
Solid understanding of ci/cd pipelines, cloud platforms (e.g., aws, azure, gcp), and containerization technologies (docker, kubernetes)
Familiarity with security best practices and performance optimization techniques

Ensure the organization's compliance with all legal requirements and internal safety

Promote a strong safety culture through awareness campaigns, inductions, and regular communication.

Conduct regular emergency drills and exercises to ensure preparedness.

Communicate effectively with employees, management, and external stakeholders on safety issues.
Participate in safety committees and meetings.
Address employee safety concerns promptly and effectively.

Ensure all documentation is readily accessible and compliant with legal requirements.

Ensure the availability and proper use of personal protective equipment (PPE) and safety equipment.
Monitor the maintenance and safety of workplace equipment and machinery.
Advise on the safe handling and disposal of hazardous substances.

jobs.duties_and_responsibilities:
Strategic Quality Development

Design and implement hospital-wide quality improvement strategies aligned with clinical excellence and operational efficiency goals.
Establish long-term quality objectives and create measurable action plans to achieve them.
Stay abreast of national and international healthcare quality trends to ensure the hospital remains at the forefront of best practices.

Compliance, Accreditation & Risk Management

Ensure hospital operations meet or exceed standards set by regulatory and oversight bodies, including Safecare and ISO9001 accreditation requirements.
Coordinate internal and external audits and inspections; develop and oversee corrective and preventive action plans.
Promote a culture of compliance and risk mitigation across all departments.

Data-Driven Quality Improvement

Collect, analyze, and interpret hospital performance data to monitor Key Performance Indicators (KPIs).
Identify quality gaps and lead initiatives to close them using evidence-based methodologies (e.g., Root Cause Analysis, PDSA cycles).
Provide regular reports and insights to senior management and department heads to support informed decision-making.

Interdepartmental Collaboration & Leadership

Lead cross-functional quality improvement teams comprising clinical, administrative, and support staff.
Facilitate regular quality review meetings and communicate quality goals, progress, and expectations clearly.
Act as a liaison between the quality department and other hospital units to ensure alignment of quality priorities.

Patient Experience Enhancement

Work closely with the patient care teams to identify areas for improving the patient journey, clinical outcomes, and service delivery.
Implement and monitor initiatives aimed at enhancing patient satisfaction scores and reducing patient complaints.
Utilize patient feedback and survey data to make evidence-based improvements.

 Documentation and Information Management

Oversee the accuracy, completeness, and integrity of clinical and operational documentation, including patient consent forms, treatment records, and policy manuals.
Ensure that document control practices meet legal, ethical, and accreditation standards.
Support the development of standard operating procedures (SOPs) and maintain up-to-date documentation repositories.
jobs.key_requirements_skills_qualification:

Minimum of 2 years’ experience in a similar Quality Lead or quality management role within a Level 4 or higher healthcare facility
Strong familiarity with Safecare and ISO9001 quality standards, with proven experience leading or supporting successful accreditation processes
Demonstrated track record of implementing hospital-wide quality improvement initiatives

Strategic Quality Development

Design and implement hospital-wide quality improvement strategies aligned with clinical excellence and operational efficiency goals.
Establish long-term quality objectives and create measurable action plans to achieve them.
Stay abreast of national and international healthcare quality trends to ensure the hospital remains at the forefront of best practices.

Ensure hospital operations meet or exceed standards set by regulatory and oversight bodies, including Safecare and ISO9001 accreditation requirements.
Coordinate internal and external audits and inspections; develop and oversee corrective and preventive action plans.

Oversee the accuracy, completeness, and integrity of clinical and operational documentation, including patient consent forms, treatment records, and policy manuals.
Ensure that document control practices meet legal, ethical, and accreditation standards.
Support the development of standard operating procedures (SOPs) and maintain up-to-date documentation repositories.

Physically inspect incoming raw materials for quality and compliance.
Conduct laboratory tests on raw materials, intermediates, and finished products (e.g., chemical composition, moisture content, pH, microbial tests).

Monitor production processes to ensure products meet specifications.
Test process water quality and other process parameters to maintain standards.

Non-Conformance Management

Identify defective materials or products.
Tag, quarantine, or report non-conforming items.
Assist in investigating quality complaints from customers.

Documentation & Reporting

Record lab results, QC inspections, and deviations in both hard copy and digital formats.
Ensure all documentation is accurate and completed on time.

Training & Guidance

Provide hands-on training for production operators on QC processes and SOPs.
Assist in reinforcing GMP and GLP practices on the floor and in the lab.

Lab & Equipment Management

Maintain laboratory instruments and tools.
Ensure proper inventory of lab chemicals and supplies.
Keep lab areas clean and organized according to Good Housekeeping practices.

Food Safety & Compliance

Monitor adherence to food safety regulations (HACCP, GMP, etc.).
Participate in food safety audits and support R&D/NPD testing when needed.

Safety & Workplace Practices

Lead or participate in daily safety briefings (“Stop for Safety”).
Follow all occupational health and safety guidelines.

Deep understanding of food safety regulations, HACCP principles and industry standards
Proficiency in using laboratory equipment and techniques for testing food products (e.g, ph meters, moisture meters, chemical analysis)
Attention to details and problem-solving skills

jobs.duties_and_responsibilities:
Material Inspection & Testing

Physically inspect incoming raw materials for quality and compliance.
Conduct laboratory tests on raw materials, intermediates, and finished products (e.g., chemical composition, moisture content, pH, microbial tests).

Process Monitoring

Monitor production processes to ensure products meet specifications.
Test process water quality and other process parameters to maintain standards.

Non-Conformance Management

Identify defective materials or products.
Tag, quarantine, or report non-conforming items.
Assist in investigating quality complaints from customers.

Documentation & Reporting

Record lab results, QC inspections, and deviations in both hard copy and digital formats.
Ensure all documentation is accurate and completed on time.

Training & Guidance

Provide hands-on training for production operators on QC processes and SOPs.
Assist in reinforcing GMP and GLP practices on the floor and in the lab.

Lab & Equipment Management

Maintain laboratory instruments and tools.
Ensure proper inventory of lab chemicals and supplies.
Keep lab areas clean and organized according to Good Housekeeping practices.

Food Safety & Compliance

Monitor adherence to food safety regulations (HACCP, GMP, etc.).
Participate in food safety audits and support R&D/NPD testing when needed.

Safety & Workplace Practices

Lead or participate in daily safety briefings (“Stop for Safety”).
Follow all occupational health and safety guidelines.

Degree/diploma in food science, industrial chemistry microbiology or related field

Deep understanding of food safety regulations, HACCP principles and industry standards
Proficiency in using laboratory equipment and techniques for testing food products (e.g, ph meters, moisture meters, chemical analysis)
Attention to details and problem-solving skills

jobs.duties_and_responsibilities:
Retail Sales Execution:

Actively visit assigned retail outlets on a daily/weekly schedule to promote and sell the company’s alcoholic beverages.
Present product offerings clearly and persuasively to shop owners and retail staff.
Upsell and cross-sell products to maximize sales and profitability.

Order Management:

Collect accurate orders from retail outlets and ensure they are processed in a timely manner.
Track order delivery and follow up to ensure customer satisfaction.
Maintain records of sales transactions and update sales reporting systems regularly.

Customer Relationship Management:

Build and nurture strong, long-term relationships with shop owners and retail staff.
Serve as the main point of contact for retail outlets, addressing inquiries, complaints, or special requests promptly.
Educate retailers about new products, promotions, and seasonal offerings to encourage repeat business.

Market Intelligence & Reporting:

Monitor competitor activities, pricing, and promotions in the retail sector.
Gather market feedback, including customer preferences, trends, and challenges in retail environments.
Prepare and submit weekly and monthly sales reports, highlighting performance, insights, and opportunities.

 
 
 
Stock & Merchandising Management:

Ensure proper display and merchandising of products in retail outlets according to brand guidelines.
Check inventory levels at retail points and advise on restocking needs.
Ensure products are stored and presented according to safety and quality standards.

Achievement of Sales Targets:

Meet or exceed monthly and quarterly sales targets set by management.
Develop strategies to increase sales in assigned territory, including promotions, sampling, and loyalty programs.
Continuously look for new retail opportunities to expand the customer base.

Professional Representation:

Represent the company professionally during all retail interactions.
Uphold brand image and ensure company policies and procedures are followed at all times.

Self-motivated, organized, and able to work independently

jobs.duties_and_responsibilities:
Strategic Quality Development

Design and implement hospital-wide quality improvement strategies aligned with clinical excellence and operational efficiency goals.
Establish long-term quality objectives and create measurable action plans to achieve them.
Stay abreast of national and international healthcare quality trends to ensure the hospital remains at the forefront of best practices.

Compliance, Accreditation & Risk Management

Ensure hospital operations meet or exceed standards set by regulatory and oversight bodies, including Safecare and ISO9001 accreditation requirements.
Coordinate internal and external audits and inspections; develop and oversee corrective and preventive action plans.
Promote a culture of compliance and risk mitigation across all departments.

Data-Driven Quality Improvement

Collect, analyze, and interpret hospital performance data to monitor Key Performance Indicators (KPIs).
Identify quality gaps and lead initiatives to close them using evidence-based methodologies (e.g., Root Cause Analysis, PDSA cycles).
Provide regular reports and insights to senior management and department heads to support informed decision-making.

Interdepartmental Collaboration & Leadership

Lead cross-functional quality improvement teams comprising clinical, administrative, and support staff.
Facilitate regular quality review meetings and communicate quality goals, progress, and expectations clearly.
Act as a liaison between the quality department and other hospital units to ensure alignment of quality priorities.

Patient Experience Enhancement

Work closely with the patient care teams to identify areas for improving the patient journey, clinical outcomes, and service delivery.
Implement and monitor initiatives aimed at enhancing patient satisfaction scores and reducing patient complaints.
Utilize patient feedback and survey data to make evidence-based improvements.

 Documentation and Information Management

Oversee the accuracy, completeness, and integrity of clinical and operational documentation, including patient consent forms, treatment records, and policy manuals.
Ensure that document control practices meet legal, ethical, and accreditation standards.
Support the development of standard operating procedures (SOPs) and maintain up-to-date documentation repositories.
jobs.key_requirements_skills_qualification:
Degree in a medical or health-related field (e.g., Nursing, Clinical Medicine, Public Health, Health Systems Management)
Minimum of 2 years’ experience in a similar Quality Lead or quality management role within a Level 4 or higher healthcare facility
Strong familiarity with Safecare and ISO9001 quality standards, with proven experience leading or supporting successful accreditation processes
Demonstrated track record of implementing hospital-wide quality improvement initiatives

jobs.duties_and_responsibilities:
Material Inspection & Testing

Physically inspect incoming raw materials for quality and compliance.
Conduct laboratory tests on raw materials, intermediates, and finished products (e.g., chemical composition, moisture content, pH, microbial tests).

Process Monitoring

Monitor production processes to ensure products meet specifications.
Test process water quality and other process parameters to maintain standards.

Non-Conformance Management

Identify defective materials or products.
Tag, quarantine, or report non-conforming items.
Assist in investigating quality complaints from customers.

Documentation & Reporting

Record lab results, QC inspections, and deviations in both hard copy and digital formats.
Ensure all documentation is accurate and completed on time.

Training & Guidance

Provide hands-on training for production operators on QC processes and SOPs.
Assist in reinforcing GMP and GLP practices on the floor and in the lab.

Lab & Equipment Management

Maintain laboratory instruments and tools.
Ensure proper inventory of lab chemicals and supplies.
Keep lab areas clean and organized according to Good Housekeeping practices.

Food Safety & Compliance

Monitor adherence to food safety regulations (HACCP, GMP, etc.).
Participate in food safety audits and support R&D/NPD testing when needed.

Safety & Workplace Practices

Lead or participate in daily safety briefings (“Stop for Safety”).
Follow all occupational health and safety guidelines.
jobs.key_requirements_skills_qualification:
Degree/diploma in food science, industrial chemistry microbiology or related field
Over 3 years relevant experience in FMCG, food processing/manufacturing
Deep understanding of food safety regulations, HACCP principles and industry standards
Proficiency in using laboratory equipment and techniques for testing food products (e.g, ph meters, moisture meters, chemical analysis)
Attention to details and problem-solving skills

Maintain transparent, organized, and audit-ready financial records.

Implement cost control measures without compromising quality or operational efficiency.
Evaluate profitability by product line, customer segment, and sales channel.

Identify gaps in financial processes and implement efficient solutions.
Lead the implementation of financial systems, automation tools, and reporting dashboards.
Ensure finance operations are scalable to support business growth.

jobs.duties_and_responsibilities:

Recommend investment opportunities, cost optimization strategies, and revenue enhancement initiatives.

Prepare accurate and timely monthly, quarterly, and annual financial statements (Profit & Loss, Balance Sheet, Cash Flow).
Conduct variance analysis between budgets, forecasts, and actual results, providing actionable recommendations.
Present financial insights to management to aid strategic decisions, including pricing, cost control, and capital expenditure.

Lead the annual budgeting process, ensuring alignment with departmental and organizational goals.

Develop rolling forecasts and scenario analyses to anticipate business risks and opportunities.

Ensure sufficient liquidity for operational needs while optimizing returns on surplus funds.
Manage banking relationships, negotiate favorable terms, and oversee company investments.

Internal Controls & Risk Management

Design, implement, and enforce financial policies, procedures, and internal controls.
Identify financial and operational risks and develop mitigation strategies.
Ensure compliance with local regulations, tax laws, and accounting standards (IFRS & local GAAP).

Audit & Compliance

Coordinate annual audits and ensure timely submission of all statutory returns (taxes, regulatory filings).
Liaise with external auditors and regulatory authorities.
Maintain transparent, organized, and audit-ready financial records.

Cost Management & Profitability Analysis

Analyze production, operational, and distribution costs to identify savings opportunities.
Implement cost control measures without compromising quality or operational efficiency.
Evaluate profitability by product line, customer segment, and sales channel.

Team Leadership & Development

Lead, mentor, and develop the finance team to ensure high performance and professional growth.
Allocate responsibilities, monitor team KPIs, and conduct performance appraisals.
Foster a culture of accountability, continuous improvement, and collaboration.

Cross-Functional Collaboration

Work closely with operations, sales, procurement, and production teams to provide financial guidance.
Support pricing decisions, capital expenditure requests, and business expansion initiatives.
Act as a strategic business partner to senior management in decision-making processes.

System & Process Improvement

Identify gaps in financial processes and implement efficient solutions.
Lead the implementation of financial systems, automation tools, and reporting dashboards.
Ensure finance operations are scalable to support business growth.

jobs.duties_and_responsibilities:
Project Management, Strategic Planning, Execution & Governance 

Serve as a strategic advisor to the Managing Director, aligning operational plans with companywide transformation goals and ensure frontline management.
Lead implementation of cross-functional projects under the Strategic Execution &
Transformation, ensuring milestones, timelines, and deliverables are tracked across all business units.
Establish formal escalation paths for stalled actions and unresolved cross-departmental issues.
Submit weekly and monthly operational summary reports to the MD and provide inputs into board-level strategic updates.
Lead Weekly Operations Review (WOR) HODs meetings and ensure Daily Operations Review
(DOR) cascading meetings are done and minutes recorded, filed and dashboards to track tasks to completion.
Ensure Project Management through Master Plan, Gantt chart and other tools to monitor success.

 Commercial Execution & Accountability 

Chair the Weekly Operations Review (WOR) meetings, ensuring 100% HOD participation and real-time tracker updates as per the Operations Review SOP.
Implement a matrix accountability framework across Factory, Depot, Transport, and

Commercial teams, with clear KPIs and escalation mechanisms.

Assign clear ownership of dashboard reports by department and ensure monthly sign-offs on operations metrics.
Sales Leadership: Develop and execute a strategic sales plan to meet and exceed monthly sales targets
Provide Leadership in marketing and brand management to successfully execute and manage marketing budget, maximize the ROI of all initiatives and maintain high accountability of budget.
Departmental Team Management: Lead, mentor, and motivate a team of Sales Representatives to achieve individual and collective sales goals. Foster a collaborative and results-driven team environment.
Perform Monthly Customer Satisfaction and Net Promoter Score and grow month on month.

Factory Oversight & Maintenance Coordination 

Oversee daily and weekly production planning in line with the Production SOP, coordinating shift schedules, material readiness, and preventive maintenance.
Align production targets with delivery timelines and customer priorities maintain OEE , Lean Six Sigma, Kaizen and DMAIC methodologies to streamline processes.
Define a structured escalation protocol for urgent customer-priority orders and production line downtime decisions in collaboration with the Factory Manager.

Quality, Safety & Legal Compliance 

Ensure 100% adherence to KEBS and ISO quality standards, executing quality protocols and non-conformance reporting as outlined in the Production SOP.
Enforce all health and safety protocols in accordance with the SHE SOP and the company’s Occupational Safety policy.
Oversee compliance with all statutory regulations (KEBS, OSHA, NEMA, KRA) and internal legal frameworks.
Coordinate quarterly SHE audits, maintain PPE compliance logs, and supervise biannual emergency drills.

Budgeting & Cost Control 

Collaborate with Finance to develop and manage operational budgets, monitor variance within ±5%, and escalate deviations as per the Budgeting & Cost Control SOP.

Review monthly cost center performance reports with Finance to guide corrective actions.
Approve expenditure within pre-defined thresholds, escalating capital or exceptional costs as per company policy.
Human Capital, Appraisals & Performance Management 

Lead monthly performance check-ins and quarterly appraisals in line with the HR Manual and the Commission & KPI SOP.
Implement coaching, PIP, and reward/reprimand processes anchored to appraisal outcomes.
PIP cycles shall run for 30–60 days, with HR guidance and documentation per the Disciplinary SOP.
Collaborate with HR to develop a leadership pipeline, succession matrix, and cross-functional training plans.
Implement Train the Trainer Strategy.

ICT Systems Implementation, Utilization & Reporting 

Ensure full adoption and real-time data entry into ERP and CRM platforms, with automated dashboards for operations, dispatch, and production.
Drive reporting, fuel tracking, and customer delivery analytics as per the ERP/CRM Utilization SOP.
Coordinate with ICT for quarterly access review, audit trail monitoring, and system security compliance.
Implement automated operational dashboards and executive reports using Power BI, Tableau,
SQL, and advanced Excel, improving KPI visibility

Depots and Supply Chain Oversight 

Dispatch, Routing & Delivery - Oversee routing plans, fuel calculations, and delivery

sequencing in line with the Routing SOP and Dispatch SOP.

Ensure 100% compliance with OTIF standards, load verification, and sealing protocols

monitored via Loss Control systems.

Escalate failed dispatches, delays, and rerouting issues through the proper chain of command.
Participate in weekly forecast reviews with Commercial and ensure no overdue orders exceed 7 working days.

Loss Control, Fraud Prevention & Risk Management 

Monitor execution of Loss Control Policy and shrinkage prevention strategy across depot, supply chain, commercial and all other areas.
Review CCTV, GPS, fuel sensor logs, and route adherence weekly with the Loss Control Unit.
Ensure all loss or fraud incidents are reported to authorities within 48 hours and

investigations closed within 7 working days.
Environmental Compliance & Sustainability 

Enforce environmental reporting and compliance with internal and NEMA standards as guided by the Environmental Compliance SOP.
Track power usage, machine emissions, and waste management KPIs in collaboration with the HSSE and Maintenance teams.
Support implementation of sustainable practices in production and logistics.

Crisis Management & Business Continuity 

Lead operational response under the Crisis Management Policy, ensuring all incidents are assessed, escalated, and closed with documented resolutions.
Maintain up-to-date risk registers, SOP backups, and continuity plans across key operational areas.
Participate in quarterly simulations and staff briefings on crisis readiness.
Apply the ADR framework to manage formal disputes with closure targeted within 14

working days.

Lead implementation of cross-functional projects under the Strategic Execution &

Establish formal escalation paths for stalled actions and unresolved cross-departmental issues.
Submit weekly and monthly operational summary reports to the MD and provide inputs into board-level strategic updates.
Lead Weekly Operations Review (WOR) HODs meetings and ensure Daily Operations Review

Ensure Project Management through Master Plan, Gantt chart and other tools to monitor success.

 Commercial Execution & Accountability 

Chair the Weekly Operations Review (WOR) meetings, ensuring 100% HOD participation and real-time tracker updates as per the Operations Review SOP.
Implement a matrix accountability framework across Factory, Depot, Transport, and

Commercial teams, with clear KPIs and escalation mechanisms.

Assign clear ownership of dashboard reports by department and ensure monthly sign-offs on operations metrics.
Sales Leadership: Develop and execute a strategic sales plan to meet and exceed monthly sales targets
Provide Leadership in marketing and brand management to successfully execute and manage marketing budget, maximize the ROI of all initiatives and maintain high accountability of budget.
Departmental Team Management: Lead, mentor, and motivate a team of Sales Representatives to achieve individual and collective sales goals. Foster a collaborative and results-driven team environment.
Perform Monthly Customer Satisfaction and Net Promoter Score and grow month on month.

Factory Oversight & Maintenance Coordination 

Oversee daily and weekly production planning in line with the Production SOP, coordinating shift schedules, material readiness, and preventive maintenance.
Align production targets with delivery timelines and customer priorities maintain OEE , Lean Six Sigma, Kaizen and DMAIC methodologies to streamline processes.
Define a structured escalation protocol for urgent customer-priority orders and production line downtime decisions in collaboration with the Factory Manager.

Quality, Safety & Legal Compliance 

Ensure 100% adherence to KEBS and ISO quality standards, executing quality protocols and non-conformance reporting as outlined in the Production SOP.
Enforce all health and safety protocols in accordance with the SHE SOP and the company’s Occupational Safety policy.
Oversee compliance with all statutory regulations (KEBS, OSHA, NEMA, KRA) and internal legal frameworks.
Coordinate quarterly SHE audits, maintain PPE compliance logs, and supervise biannual emergency drills.

Budgeting & Cost Control 

Collaborate with Finance to develop and manage operational budgets, monitor variance within ±5%, and escalate deviations as per the Budgeting & Cost Control SOP.

Review monthly cost center performance reports with Finance to guide corrective actions.
Approve expenditure within pre-defined thresholds, escalating capital or exceptional costs as per company policy.
Human Capital, Appraisals & Performance Management 

Lead monthly performance check-ins and quarterly appraisals in line with the HR Manual and the Commission & KPI SOP.
Implement coaching, PIP, and reward/reprimand processes anchored to appraisal outcomes.
PIP cycles shall run for 30–60 days, with HR guidance and documentation per the Disciplinary SOP.
Collaborate with HR to develop a leadership pipeline, succession matrix, and cross-functional training plans.
Implement Train the Trainer Strategy.

ICT Systems Implementation, Utilization & Reporting 

Ensure full adoption and real-time data entry into ERP and CRM platforms, with automated dashboards for operations, dispatch, and production.
Drive reporting, fuel tracking, and customer delivery analytics as per the ERP/CRM Utilization SOP.
Coordinate with ICT for quarterly access review, audit trail monitoring, and system security compliance.
Implement automated operational dashboards and executive reports using Power BI, Tableau,
SQL, and advanced Excel, improving KPI visibility

Depots and Supply Chain Oversight 

Dispatch, Routing & Delivery - Oversee routing plans, fuel calculations, and delivery

sequencing in line with the Routing SOP and Dispatch SOP.

Ensure 100% compliance with OTIF standards, load verification, and sealing protocols

monitored via Loss Control systems.

Escalate failed dispatches, delays, and rerouting issues through the proper chain of command.
Participate in weekly forecast reviews with Commercial and ensure no overdue orders exceed 7 working days.

Loss Control, Fraud Prevention & Risk Management 

Monitor execution of Loss Control Policy and shrinkage prevention strategy across depot, supply chain, commercial and all other areas.
Review CCTV, GPS, fuel sensor logs, and route adherence weekly with the Loss Control Unit.
Ensure all loss or fraud incidents are reported to authorities within 48 hours and

investigations closed within 7 working days.
Environmental Compliance & Sustainability 

Enforce environmental reporting and compliance with internal and NEMA standards as guided by the Environmental Compliance SOP.
Track power usage, machine emissions, and waste management KPIs in collaboration with the HSSE and Maintenance teams.
Support implementation of sustainable practices in production and logistics.

Crisis Management & Business Continuity 

Lead operational response under the Crisis Management Policy, ensuring all incidents are assessed, escalated, and closed with documented resolutions.
Maintain up-to-date risk registers, SOP backups, and continuity plans across key operational areas.

Apply the ADR framework to manage formal disputes with closure targeted within 14

working days.

jobs.duties_and_responsibilities:
Preventive Maintenance

Conduct scheduled preventive maintenance on all mechanical systems and equipment.
Inspect machines to detect potential faults and take corrective action before breakdowns occur.
Maintain maintenance logs, checklists, and service records accurately.

Troubleshooting and Repairs

Diagnose and repair faults in mechanical systems and machinery.
Replace or refurbish defective components to restore functionality.
Report major system failures to the HOD and recommend corrective measures.

Metal Fabrication and Welding

Perform metal cutting, shaping, and welding for repairs or new installations.
Fabricate mechanical parts, brackets, and supports as required.
Ensure welding tools and equipment are maintained in safe working condition.

 Daily Equipment Inspections

Conduct daily operational checks on fridges, cold rooms, and boilers.
Monitor performance parameters (temperature, pressure, etc.) to ensure proper functioning.
Immediately report abnormal readings or system malfunctions to the HOD.

Maintenance of Industrial Kitchen Equipment

Service and maintain industrial kitchen machines such as ovens, fryers, and dishwashers.
Inspect and repair equipment to ensure safe and hygienic operation.
Provide prompt response to maintenance requests from kitchen staff.

 
 
 
Health, Safety, and Compliance

Follow all safety procedures and use appropriate personal protective equipment (PPE).
Ensure maintenance activities comply with safety standards and company policies.
Identify and report hazards, unsafe conditions, or near-miss incidents immediately.

Coordination and Reporting

Work closely with the Mechanical HOD and other team members to plan and execute maintenance tasks.
Provide regular updates on completed work, ongoing maintenance, and required spare parts.
Maintain good communication and collaboration with other departments to support operations.

jobs.duties_and_responsibilities:
Sales and Business Development

Identify, approach, and acquire new clients in the beauty and cosmetics industry (retailers, salons, spas, individual customers).
Achieve monthly and quarterly sales targets as set by management.
Demonstrate and promote beauty products to clients through presentations, product trials, and sampling sessions.
Actively upsell and cross-sell products to maximize revenue per client.

Client Relationship Management

Build and maintain strong, long-term customer relationships to ensure repeat business and brand loyalty.
Handle client inquiries, resolve complaints promptly, and ensure high levels of customer satisfaction.
Maintain an updated customer database and track buying patterns and preferences.

Market Intelligence and Reporting

Conduct market research to identify trends, competitor activities, and customer needs.
Provide feedback to management on customer preferences, product performance, and market opportunities.
Prepare regular sales reports, forecasts, and performance analyses.

Marketing Support and Brand Promotion

Participate in marketing campaigns, beauty expos, and promotional events to enhance brand visibility.
Collaborate with marketing teams to implement product promotions and advertising strategies.
Ensure product displays, merchandising, and branding meet company standards at all sales points.

 
Administrative Duties

Process orders, deliveries, and invoices accurately and promptly.
Maintain proper sales records, inventory updates, and customer documentation.
Adhere to company sales policies, ethics, and compliance requirements.

Diploma or Degree in Sales & Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field
Minimum 5 years of relevant experience in beauty product sales (cosmetics, skincare, haircare, or related)
Proven track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets
Excellent communication, presentation, and interpersonal skills
Strong negotiation, persuasion, and customer service abilities
Good understanding of beauty products, ingredients, and market trends
Self-driven, result-oriented, and able to work independently with minimal supervision

jobs.duties_and_responsibilities:
Project Management, Strategic Planning, Execution & Governance 

Serve as a strategic advisor to the Managing Director, aligning operational plans with companywide transformation goals and ensure frontline management.
Lead implementation of cross-functional projects under the Strategic Execution &
Transformation, ensuring milestones, timelines, and deliverables are tracked across all business units.
Establish formal escalation paths for stalled actions and unresolved cross-departmental issues.
Submit weekly and monthly operational summary reports to the MD and provide inputs into board-level strategic updates.
Lead Weekly Operations Review (WOR) HODs meetings and ensure Daily Operations Review
(DOR) cascading meetings are done and minutes recorded, filed and dashboards to track tasks to completion.
Ensure Project Management through Master Plan, Gantt chart and other tools to monitor success.

 Commercial Execution & Accountability 

Chair the Weekly Operations Review (WOR) meetings, ensuring 100% HOD participation and real-time tracker updates as per the Operations Review SOP.
Implement a matrix accountability framework across Factory, Depot, Transport, and

Commercial teams, with clear KPIs and escalation mechanisms.

Assign clear ownership of dashboard reports by department and ensure monthly sign-offs on operations metrics.
Sales Leadership: Develop and execute a strategic sales plan to meet and exceed monthly sales targets
Provide Leadership in marketing and brand management to successfully execute and manage marketing budget, maximize the ROI of all initiatives and maintain high accountability of budget.
Departmental Team Management: Lead, mentor, and motivate a team of Sales Representatives to achieve individual and collective sales goals. Foster a collaborative and results-driven team environment.
Perform Monthly Customer Satisfaction and Net Promoter Score and grow month on month.

Factory Oversight & Maintenance Coordination 

Oversee daily and weekly production planning in line with the Production SOP, coordinating shift schedules, material readiness, and preventive maintenance.
Align production targets with delivery timelines and customer priorities maintain OEE , Lean Six Sigma, Kaizen and DMAIC methodologies to streamline processes.
Define a structured escalation protocol for urgent customer-priority orders and production line downtime decisions in collaboration with the Factory Manager.

Quality, Safety & Legal Compliance 

Ensure 100% adherence to KEBS and ISO quality standards, executing quality protocols and non-conformance reporting as outlined in the Production SOP.
Enforce all health and safety protocols in accordance with the SHE SOP and the company’s Occupational Safety policy.
Oversee compliance with all statutory regulations (KEBS, OSHA, NEMA, KRA) and internal legal frameworks.
Coordinate quarterly SHE audits, maintain PPE compliance logs, and supervise biannual emergency drills.

Budgeting & Cost Control 

Collaborate with Finance to develop and manage operational budgets, monitor variance within ±5%, and escalate deviations as per the Budgeting & Cost Control SOP.

Review monthly cost center performance reports with Finance to guide corrective actions.
Approve expenditure within pre-defined thresholds, escalating capital or exceptional costs as per company policy.
Human Capital, Appraisals & Performance Management 

Lead monthly performance check-ins and quarterly appraisals in line with the HR Manual and the Commission & KPI SOP.
Implement coaching, PIP, and reward/reprimand processes anchored to appraisal outcomes.
PIP cycles shall run for 30–60 days, with HR guidance and documentation per the Disciplinary SOP.
Collaborate with HR to develop a leadership pipeline, succession matrix, and cross-functional training plans.
Implement Train the Trainer Strategy.

ICT Systems Implementation, Utilization & Reporting 

Ensure full adoption and real-time data entry into ERP and CRM platforms, with automated dashboards for operations, dispatch, and production.
Drive reporting, fuel tracking, and customer delivery analytics as per the ERP/CRM Utilization SOP.
Coordinate with ICT for quarterly access review, audit trail monitoring, and system security compliance.
Implement automated operational dashboards and executive reports using Power BI, Tableau,
SQL, and advanced Excel, improving KPI visibility

Depots and Supply Chain Oversight 

Dispatch, Routing & Delivery - Oversee routing plans, fuel calculations, and delivery

sequencing in line with the Routing SOP and Dispatch SOP.

Ensure 100% compliance with OTIF standards, load verification, and sealing protocols

monitored via Loss Control systems.

Escalate failed dispatches, delays, and rerouting issues through the proper chain of command.
Participate in weekly forecast reviews with Commercial and ensure no overdue orders exceed 7 working days.

Loss Control, Fraud Prevention & Risk Management 

Monitor execution of Loss Control Policy and shrinkage prevention strategy across depot, supply chain, commercial and all other areas.
Review CCTV, GPS, fuel sensor logs, and route adherence weekly with the Loss Control Unit.
Ensure all loss or fraud incidents are reported to authorities within 48 hours and

investigations closed within 7 working days.
Environmental Compliance & Sustainability 

Enforce environmental reporting and compliance with internal and NEMA standards as guided by the Environmental Compliance SOP.
Track power usage, machine emissions, and waste management KPIs in collaboration with the HSSE and Maintenance teams.
Support implementation of sustainable practices in production and logistics.

Crisis Management & Business Continuity 

Lead operational response under the Crisis Management Policy, ensuring all incidents are assessed, escalated, and closed with documented resolutions.
Maintain up-to-date risk registers, SOP backups, and continuity plans across key operational areas.
Participate in quarterly simulations and staff briefings on crisis readiness.
Apply the ADR framework to manage formal disputes with closure targeted within 14

working days.

Degree in Operations Management, Engineering, or Business Administration
5–8 years’ experience in manufacturing or logistics operations
Proven experience in a sales-oriented operations role within a manufacturing environment
Strong understanding of Sales and Marketing processes and their impact on operations
Proficiency in ERP/CRM systems, data analytics, and project management tools
Six Sigma, Kaizen, or DMAIC certification; Lean Management is an added advantage

jobs.duties_and_responsibilities:
Project Management, Strategic Planning, Execution & Governance 

Serve as a strategic advisor to the Managing Director, aligning operational plans with companywide transformation goals and ensure frontline management.
Lead implementation of cross-functional projects under the Strategic Execution &
Transformation, ensuring milestones, timelines, and deliverables are tracked across all business units.
Establish formal escalation paths for stalled actions and unresolved cross-departmental issues.
Submit weekly and monthly operational summary reports to the MD and provide inputs into board-level strategic updates.
Lead Weekly Operations Review (WOR) HODs meetings and ensure Daily Operations Review
(DOR) cascading meetings are done and minutes recorded, filed and dashboards to track tasks to completion.
Ensure Project Management through Master Plan, Gantt chart and other tools to monitor success.

 Commercial Execution & Accountability 

Chair the Weekly Operations Review (WOR) meetings, ensuring 100% HOD participation and real-time tracker updates as per the Operations Review SOP.
Implement a matrix accountability framework across Factory, Depot, Transport, and

Commercial teams, with clear KPIs and escalation mechanisms.

Assign clear ownership of dashboard reports by department and ensure monthly sign-offs on operations metrics.
Sales Leadership: Develop and execute a strategic sales plan to meet and exceed monthly sales targets
Provide Leadership in marketing and brand management to successfully execute and manage marketing budget, maximize the ROI of all initiatives and maintain high accountability of budget.
Departmental Team Management: Lead, mentor, and motivate a team of Sales Representatives to achieve individual and collective sales goals. Foster a collaborative and results-driven team environment.
Perform Monthly Customer Satisfaction and Net Promoter Score and grow month on month.

Factory Oversight & Maintenance Coordination 

Oversee daily and weekly production planning in line with the Production SOP, coordinating shift schedules, material readiness, and preventive maintenance.
Align production targets with delivery timelines and customer priorities maintain OEE , Lean Six Sigma, Kaizen and DMAIC methodologies to streamline processes.
Define a structured escalation protocol for urgent customer-priority orders and production line downtime decisions in collaboration with the Factory Manager.

Quality, Safety & Legal Compliance 

Ensure 100% adherence to KEBS and ISO quality standards, executing quality protocols and non-conformance reporting as outlined in the Production SOP.
Enforce all health and safety protocols in accordance with the SHE SOP and the company’s Occupational Safety policy.
Oversee compliance with all statutory regulations (KEBS, OSHA, NEMA, KRA) and internal legal frameworks.
Coordinate quarterly SHE audits, maintain PPE compliance logs, and supervise biannual emergency drills.

Budgeting & Cost Control 

Collaborate with Finance to develop and manage operational budgets, monitor variance within ±5%, and escalate deviations as per the Budgeting & Cost Control SOP.

Review monthly cost center performance reports with Finance to guide corrective actions.
Approve expenditure within pre-defined thresholds, escalating capital or exceptional costs as per company policy.
Human Capital, Appraisals & Performance Management 

Lead monthly performance check-ins and quarterly appraisals in line with the HR Manual and the Commission & KPI SOP.
Implement coaching, PIP, and reward/reprimand processes anchored to appraisal outcomes.
PIP cycles shall run for 30–60 days, with HR guidance and documentation per the Disciplinary SOP.
Collaborate with HR to develop a leadership pipeline, succession matrix, and cross-functional training plans.
Implement Train the Trainer Strategy.

ICT Systems Implementation, Utilization & Reporting 

Ensure full adoption and real-time data entry into ERP and CRM platforms, with automated dashboards for operations, dispatch, and production.
Drive reporting, fuel tracking, and customer delivery analytics as per the ERP/CRM Utilization SOP.
Coordinate with ICT for quarterly access review, audit trail monitoring, and system security compliance.
Implement automated operational dashboards and executive reports using Power BI, Tableau,
SQL, and advanced Excel, improving KPI visibility

Depots and Supply Chain Oversight 

Dispatch, Routing & Delivery - Oversee routing plans, fuel calculations, and delivery

sequencing in line with the Routing SOP and Dispatch SOP.

Ensure 100% compliance with OTIF standards, load verification, and sealing protocols

monitored via Loss Control systems.

Escalate failed dispatches, delays, and rerouting issues through the proper chain of command.
Participate in weekly forecast reviews with Commercial and ensure no overdue orders exceed 7 working days.

Loss Control, Fraud Prevention & Risk Management 

Monitor execution of Loss Control Policy and shrinkage prevention strategy across depot, supply chain, commercial and all other areas.
Review CCTV, GPS, fuel sensor logs, and route adherence weekly with the Loss Control Unit.
Ensure all loss or fraud incidents are reported to authorities within 48 hours and

investigations closed within 7 working days.
Environmental Compliance & Sustainability 

Enforce environmental reporting and compliance with internal and NEMA standards as guided by the Environmental Compliance SOP.
Track power usage, machine emissions, and waste management KPIs in collaboration with the HSSE and Maintenance teams.
Support implementation of sustainable practices in production and logistics.

Crisis Management & Business Continuity

Work closely with the Mechanical HOD and other team members to plan and execute maintenance tasks.
Provide regular updates on completed work, ongoing maintenance, and required spare parts.
Maintain good communication and collaboration with other departments to support operations.

Serve as a strategic advisor to the Managing Director, aligning operational plans with companywide transformation goals and ensure frontline management.
Lead implementation of cross-functional projects under the Strategic Execution &
Transformation, ensuring milestones, timelines, and deliverables are tracked across all business units.
Establish formal escalation paths for stalled actions and unresolved cross-departmental issues.
Submit weekly and monthly operational summary reports to the MD and provide inputs into board-level strategic updates.
Lead Weekly Operations Review (WOR) HODs meetings and ensure Daily Operations Review
(DOR) cascading meetings are done and minutes recorded, filed and dashboards to track tasks to completion.
Ensure Project Management through Master Plan, Gantt chart and other tools to monitor success.

 Commercial Execution & Accountability 

Chair the Weekly Operations Review (WOR) meetings, ensuring 100% HOD participation and real-time tracker updates as per the Operations Review SOP.
Implement a matrix accountability framework across Factory, Depot, Transport, and

Commercial teams, with clear KPIs and escalation mechanisms.

Assign clear ownership of dashboard reports by department and ensure monthly sign-offs on operations metrics.
Sales Leadership: Develop and execute a strategic sales plan to meet and exceed monthly sales targets
Provide Leadership in marketing and brand management to successfully execute and manage marketing budget, maximize the ROI of all initiatives and maintain high accountability of budget.
Departmental Team Management: Lead, mentor, and motivate a team of Sales Representatives to achieve individual and collective sales goals. Foster a collaborative and results-driven team environment.
Perform Monthly Customer Satisfaction and Net Promoter Score and grow month on month.

Factory Oversight & Maintenance Coordination 

Oversee daily and weekly production planning in line with the Production SOP, coordinating shift schedules, material readiness, and preventive maintenance.
Align production targets with delivery timelines and customer priorities maintain OEE , Lean Six Sigma, Kaizen and DMAIC methodologies to streamline processes.
Define a structured escalation protocol for urgent customer-priority orders and production line downtime decisions in collaboration with the Factory Manager.

Quality, Safety & Legal Compliance 

Ensure 100% adherence to KEBS and ISO quality standards, executing quality protocols and non-conformance reporting as outlined in the Production SOP.
Enforce all health and safety protocols in accordance with the SHE SOP and the company’s Occupational Safety policy.
Oversee compliance with all statutory regulations (KEBS, OSHA, NEMA, KRA) and internal legal frameworks.
Coordinate quarterly SHE audits, maintain PPE compliance logs, and supervise biannual emergency drills.

Budgeting & Cost Control 

Collaborate with Finance to develop and manage operational budgets, monitor variance within ±5%, and escalate deviations as per the Budgeting & Cost Control SOP.

Review monthly cost center performance reports with Finance to guide corrective actions.
Approve expenditure within pre-defined thresholds, escalating capital or exceptional costs as per company policy.
Human Capital, Appraisals & Performance Management 

Lead monthly performance check-ins and quarterly appraisals in line with the HR Manual and the Commission & KPI SOP.
Implement coaching, PIP, and reward/reprimand processes anchored to appraisal outcomes.
PIP cycles shall run for 30–60 days, with HR guidance and documentation per the Disciplinary SOP.
Collaborate with HR to develop a leadership pipeline, succession matrix, and cross-functional training plans.
Implement Train the Trainer Strategy.

ICT Systems Implementation, Utilization & Reporting 

Ensure full adoption and real-time data entry into ERP and CRM platforms, with automated dashboards for operations, dispatch, and production.
Drive reporting, fuel tracking, and customer delivery analytics as per the ERP/CRM Utilization SOP.
Coordinate with ICT for quarterly access review, audit trail monitoring, and system security compliance.
Implement automated operational dashboards and executive reports using Power BI, Tableau,
SQL, and advanced Excel, improving KPI visibility

Depots and Supply Chain Oversight 

Dispatch, Routing & Delivery - Oversee routing plans, fuel calculations, and delivery

sequencing in line with the Routing SOP and Dispatch SOP.

Ensure 100% compliance with OTIF standards, load verification, and sealing protocols

monitored via Loss Control systems.

Escalate failed dispatches, delays, and rerouting issues through the proper chain of command.
Participate in weekly forecast reviews with Commercial and ensure no overdue orders exceed 7 working days.

Loss Control, Fraud Prevention & Risk Management 

Monitor execution of Loss Control Policy and shrinkage prevention strategy across depot, supply chain, commercial and all other areas.
Review CCTV, GPS, fuel sensor logs, and route adherence weekly with the Loss Control Unit.
Ensure all loss or fraud incidents are reported to authorities within 48 hours and

investigations closed within 7 working days.
Environmental Compliance & Sustainability 

Enforce environmental reporting and compliance with internal and NEMA standards as guided by the Environmental Compliance SOP.
Track power usage, machine emissions, and waste management KPIs in collaboration with the HSSE and Maintenance teams.
Support implementation of sustainable practices in production and logistics.

Crisis Management & Business Continuity 

Lead operational response under the Crisis Management Policy, ensuring all incidents are assessed, escalated, and closed with documented resolutions.
Maintain up-to-date risk registers, SOP backups, and continuity plans across key operational areas.
Participate in quarterly simulations and staff briefings on crisis readiness.
Apply the ADR framework to manage formal disputes with closure targeted within 14

working days.

jobs.duties_and_responsibilities:

Operate and monitor sewage Treatment Plant (STP) equipment, pumps, blowers, and clarifiers.
Ensure proper functioning of aeration tanks, sludge digesters, and chemical dosing units.
Maintain optimal operational parameters and ensure compliance with discharge norms.
Process Monitoring:
Conduct regular sampling and analysis at various stages of treatment.
Monitor parameters such as pH, COD (Chemical Oxygen Demand), BOD (Biochemical Oxygen Demand), and TSS (Total Suspended Solids) as per regulatory standards.
Documentation and Reporting:
Maintain logs of daily operations, chemical consumption, and maintenance activities.
Ensure adherence to environmental laws, such as those prescribed by pollution control boards.
Implement processes to minimize environmental impact and optimize water usage.
Preventive Maintenance:
Conduct routine checks and schedule preventive maintenance for STP equipment.
Coordinate with the maintenance team to address any equipment malfunctions or repairs promptly.
Chemical Management:
Manage the inventory and usage of treatment chemicals such as coagulants, flocculants, and disinfectants.
Optimize chemical dosing to ensure cost-effective operation while maintaining treatment efficiency.
Safety and Environmental Management:
Follow safety protocols during the operation of STP.
Address any spillages or emergencies as per established safety procedures.

2-4 years of hands-on experience in STP operations
Strong knowledge of STP processes and wastewater treatment technologies
Ability to interpret lab results and make process adjustments accordingly
Proficient in record-keeping, data logging, and report preparation
